titles.title: A bill to prohibit the further extension or establishment of national monuments in Nevada except by express authorization of Congress.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary: 1/25/2011--Introduced. Prohibits any further extension or establishment of national parks and monuments in Nevada from being undertaken, except by express authorization of Congress.
